name: Super Petey Pirahna Odd To See
name_original: Super Petey Pirahna Odd To See
description:
Super Petey Pirahna Odd To See is an adventure game developed by Mr.NeedleMouse. It was originally released in 2022.
Super Petey Pirahna Odd To See is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
